Disc Code: BLES-00521
First letter: Media Type
S = CD / DVD
U = UMD
B = BluRay
Second letter: License
C = Part 1 (Exclusive Sony, like God of War)
L = 3 rd party (multiconsolas titles, like Resident Evil 5)
Third point: Region
E = Europe / PAL
J / P = Asia / Japan
U = USA / Canada
Fourth letter: Release Type
D = demonstration (demo)
S = Retail (THIS is the final version of the Game)
